text: Marchiori is an Italian surname. Notable people with the surname include: *Alberto Marchiori (born 1993), Italian footballer *Domenico Marchiori (1828–1905), Italian painter *Fernando Marchiori (born 1979), Brazilian footballer and manager *Leo Marchiori (1898–1949), Canadian cyclist *Massimo Marchiori (born 1970), Italian mathematician and computer scientist Category:Italian-language surnames
title: Marchiori
